Jan 27 (Reuters) - AVEVA Group PLC AVV.L:: *AVEVA - ROHINTON MOBED, INDEPENDENT NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, WILL STEP DOWN FROM REMUNERATION COMMITTEE EFFECTIVE 27 JANUARY *AVEVA - AYESHA KHANNA, INDEPENDENT NON-EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR, WILL JOIN REMUNERATION COMMITTEE


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 27-JAN-202208:27:31.017 GMT
